# external/bsd/nvi Directory Architecture

## Overview
This document summarizes the top-level, git-tracked contents of `external/bsd/nvi`.

## Top-level entries
### Directories (4)
- `catalog/`
- `dist/`
- `docs/`
- `usr.bin/`

### Files (5)
- `Makefile`
- `Makefile.inc`
- `addrcsid`
- `arch.md`
- `nvi2netbsd`

## Notes
- Entries listed are tracked in git; untracked and ignored files are omitted.
- Log files (`*.log` and `*.log.*`) and `_tmp` directories are intentionally excluded.
- VCS metadata directories (.git, .hg, .svn, .bzr) are omitted.
